official_title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on coins and currency.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that the national motto, "In God We Trust," shall be reaffirmed and shall continue to be engraved and printed on coins and currency.

titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on coins and currency.
